versos: (jezreel) Hosea 1:4 - "Then the Lord said to him, 'Call him jezreel, because I will soon punish the house of Jehu for the massacre at jezreel, and I will put an end to the kingdom of Israel.'";;;
(tails) Isaiah 9:14 - So the Lord will cut off from Israel both head and tail
(olives) Joel 1:12 - The vine dries up, and the fig tree languishes; the pomegranate, palm, and apple, all the trees of the field are dried up, and gladness dries up from the children of man.;;;
(quiet) 1 Thessalonians 4:11 - "And to make it your ambition to lead a quiet life: You should mind your business and work with your hands, just as we told you,";;;

(ammon) Ezra 9:1 - After these things had been done, the leaders came to me and said, "The people of Israel, including the priests and the Levites, have not kept themselves separate from the neighboring peoples with their detestable practices, like those of the Canaanites, Hittites, Perizzites, Jebusites, Ammonites, Moabites, Egyptians and Amorites.;;;
(lies) Proverbs 14:5 - A faithful witness does not lie
(ropes) Psalm 129:4 - The LORD is righteous; he has cut me free from the cords of the wicked.;;
(beam) "Why do you see the speck that is in your brother's eye, but do not notice the beam that is in your own eye" - Matthew 7:3;;;
(shake) Jeremiah 1:10 - "See, today I appoint you over nations and kingdoms to uproot and tear down, to destroy and overthrow, to build and to plant.";;;
(fetters) Psalm 105:18 - "They bruised his feet with shackles, his neck was put in irons,";;;
(grind) Proverbs 27:22 - "Though you grind a fool in a mortar, grinding them like grain with a pestle, you will not remove their folly from them.";;;
(praised) Psalm 135:1 - "Praise the Lord Praise the name of the Lord; praise him, you servants of the Lord,";;;
(sport) 1 Timothy 4:8 - "For bodily exercise profiteth little: but godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.";;;
(dealeth) Psalm 119:69 - The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.;;;
(slothful) Proverbs 18:9 - "Whoever is slothful in his work is a brother to him who destroys.";;;
(saluted) Luke 1:40 - "And entered into the house of Zacharias, and saluted Elisabeth.";;;
